page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: THE CHILD OF 1985 by HELEN WILLOWS MONDAY...ON A MONDAY I AM ALWAYS SLEEPY.I GET UP ABOUT 8.00.I GO AS FAST AS I CAN OUT OF BED AND INTO THE BATHROOM.I PUT WATER INTO THE BASIN AND HAVE A WASH,CLEAN MY TEETH AND GO TO THE TOILET.I RUSH BACK INTO MY BEDROOM TO GET DRESSED.NOW ITS ABOUT 8.20.I RUSH DOWN STAIRS AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST.THEN ITS ABOUT 8.30.MY SISTER SITS AT THE TABLE WAITING.MUM SAYS HURRY UP HELEN.I PUT ON MY COAT, GET MY BAGS AND GO OUT AND GET IN THE CAR.BY THIS TIME IT IS ABOUT 8.40.WE STOP AT THE SHOP AND GET SOME SWEETS. THEN WE GO TO SCHOOL.NOW IT IS 8.55. I AM LATE BECAUSE I CAN NEVER MAKE UP MY MIND WHAT TO CHOOSE.BY THE TIME I GET TO SCHOOL THE BELLS ALREADY HAVE RANG. SOMETIMES SOMEONE LETS ME IN THE LINE. WE ALL TAKE OUR COATS OFF AND GO INTO THE CLASSROOM.
